initialization module¶

initialization.he(x)¶

Wrapper for torch.nn.init.kaiming_normal_ method.

Parameters

x (torch.tensor) – Input tensor to be initialized. See torch.nn.init.py for more information

Returns

Initialized tensor

Return type

torch.tensor

initialization.he_uniform(x)¶

Wrapper for torch.nn.init.kaiming_uniform_ method.

Parameters

x (torch.tensor) – Input tensor to be initialized. See torch.nn.init.py for more information

Returns

Initialized tensor

Return type

torch.tensor

initialization.weights_init(m, func=<function he_uniform>)¶

Performs weight initialization for a layer.

Parameters

  • m – The layer which weights should be initialized.

  • func – The function to use to initialize weights.

Returns

Weight initialized layer.

Return type

m

initialization.xavier(x)¶

Wrapper for torch.nn.init.xavier method.

Parameters

x (torch.tensor) – Input tensor to be initialized. See torch.nn.init.py for more information

Returns

Initialized tensor

Return type

torch.tensor

initialization.xavier_uniform(x)¶

Wrapper for torch.nn.init.xavier_uniform method.

Parameters

x (torch.tensor) – Input tensor to be initialized. See torch.nn.init.py for more information

Returns

Initialized tensor

Return type

torch.tensor
